gradle/org.gradle.api.tasks/ScalaSourceDirectorySet

ScalaSourceDirectorySet

interface ScalaSourceDirectorySet : SourceDirectorySet(source)

A ScalaSourceDirectorySet defines the properties and methods added to a org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSet by the ScalaPlugin.
